file.name: ecommerce.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: Simple Ecommerce API
  description: Provides data for an ecommece site
  version: '1.0'
servers:
  - url: http://localhost:5000/ecommerce/api/v1
paths:
  /products:
    get:
      summary: gets the list of products
      operationId: GetListOfProducts
      parameters:
        - in: query
          name: category
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: got back the list of products
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/products'
  /products/{{productId}}:
    get:
      summary: gets the information about the product with the specified productId
      responses:
        '200':
          description: got back product info
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/product'
  /cart/{{cartId}}:
    get:
      summary: tells you what items are in your cartId
      responses:
        '200':
          description: got back a list of items
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/cart'
    post:
      summary: add an item to the cartId
      responses:
        '201':
          description: add the specified item to the cart
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/product'
  /cart/{{cartId}}/{{productId}}:
    delete:
      summary: removes the given item from the given cart
      responses:
        '204':
          description: specified product removed
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
  /purchasehistory/{{userId}}:
    get:
      summary: get the purchase history of the given user
      responses:
        '200':
          description: succusfully returned a list of purchased items
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/purchases'
  /categories:
    get:
      summary: gets a list of available categories
      responses:
        '200':
          description: got a list of categories
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '/#components/schema/categories'
          links:
            ListOfCategories:
              operationId: GetListOfProducts
              parameters:
                category: '$response.body'
components:
  schemas:
    purchases:
      allOf:
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/product'
        - type: object
          properties:
            purchasedDate:
              type: string
              format: date-time
    cart:
      type: array
      items:
        $ref: '#/components/schemas/product'
    cartBody:
      type: object
    product:
      type: object
      required:
        - productId
        - description
        - price
        - imageLink
      properties:
        productId:
          type: integer
          minimum: 1
        description:
          type: string
        price:
          type: number
          minimum: 0.0
        imageLink:
          type: string
          format: uri
        category:
          type: string
      example:
          productId: 10
          description: "A Shirt"
          price: 12.55
          imageLink: "https://www.alink.com"
          category: "Men's Clothes"
    products:
      type: array
      items:
        $ref: '#/components/schemas/product'
    categories:
      type: array
      items:
        type: string

Error: parse: paths: /cart/{{cartId}}: get: : parse path: invalid path: /cart/{{cartId}}
